item.description:
Let's continue ringing in 2010 on New Year Day.
Join us for great conversation, scrumptious feasting and fun LoA activities.

Time: 4 - 8 pm

Bring:
- a percussion instrument (if you have) to ring in lots of joy and laughter
- a main entree to share.
We'll provide appetizers, salad, desserts and refreshments.

Thank you, Heather L, for welcoming us to your home.

****************************************************
Please RSVP when you know you're definitely joining us. Thank you!

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: Ringing in the New Year
